topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Adding and removing users to a project

body.p: As an admin, you can add and remove user access to each project.

section.title: Editing users associated with a project

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.

Select the appropriate region and project.
For Denver and Tahoe deployments,you can work only in regionone

Click the Identity dashboard, then the Projects panel.
A list of all projects in the current domain is displayed.

For the project you want to modify, click the Modify Users button.
On the Project Members tab of the Edit Project screen that displays, the users in the Project Members column can access and work with the current project.
Add a user to the project. Click the + icon next to that user name in the All Users column.
The user name is added to the Project Members column and can now access the project.
Remove a user to the project, click the - icon next to that user name in the Project Members column.
The user name is moved to the All Users column and can no longer access the project.
